channel.title: RShiny on Phil Palmer
channel.description: Recent content in RShiny on Phil Palmer

item.title: DTC support
item.description:
Customer support & bioinformatics pipeline development for Direct To Consumer (DTC) genetics companies such as Sano & Nebula Genomics.

For example, I developed and improved multiple bioinformatics pipelines based on user feedback including:

  • Dragen
    • Developed Nextflow pipeline for running Illumina’s Dragen pipeline including indexing, mapping, germline/somatic variant calling & copy number variant (CNV) analysis
  • Imputation
    • Benchmarked multiple imputation pipelines
    • Greatly improved Lifebit’s imputation pipeline by adding input validation & continuous integration testing. This resulted in a highly robust imputation pipeline used in production by direct to consumer genetics companies such as Nebula Genomics and Sano Genetics thousands of times to analyse their customersâ€™ data.
    • Built imputation RShiny app
  • Ancestry
    • Developed Lifebit’s intial Ancestry pipeline

item.title: Drug repurposing & pathway analysis
item.description:
Found drug targets and pathways to accelerate the pharma industry, demoing the results for a pilot with AstraZeneca.

This was for a project for the AI Engine. I built:

  1. An RShiny application to visaulise the results of the drug targets
  2. A bioinformatics pipeline in Nextflow to automate the discovery of enriched pathways

item.title: Antiviral drug repurposing
item.description:
This side project was done for a PhD application research proposal as a proof of concept

I used differential gene expression analysis & drug repurposing techniques to find compounds with similar gene expression profiles to the HSP90 inhibitor Geldanamycin
